title: Cozy Renovated 2Rm
posting_body: ['Charming bright fully renovated two room apartment with new eat in kitchen with ceramic tile,separate bedroom and full ceramic tile bathroom.', 'Heat and hot water included in the rent.', 'Electric paid by tenant .', 'Cable and Internet available from Altice.', 'Car or small suv parking , well behaved quiet and supervised small pets considered, no smoking on premises.', 'One year lease with security deposit.', 'Application,credit check and references required.', 'Apartment available .Please call 914-739-4251 between 8 am to 4pm Monday to Friday**   Principles Only-No Brokers', 'This is a small two room apartment/studio there is no living room just a kitchen and bedroom', 'Please call during regular business hours as we do not check e-mails', 'that often', 'This is a craigslist post if you are seeing this on a different site it may not be current']
